subject: Establishment of Detailed Project Report (DPR) Cell at NHAI HQ -reg.
text: #Ra 75q rTHRfgferasrut (Ts;5 9Rdev &k ToNf #A1T4, IRT FRGR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Hryia J4a 6i-5 Qi 6, #az7-10, aroul; # frrit 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TV/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Administration/ 2024 Policy Circular No.1.7.1.22/2024 dated 24th 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. ADMIN-11.0014.0/2/2024-0/0 CGM (HR/Admin-I) (Comp. No. 249476)} Sub: Establishment of Detailed Project Report (DPR) Cell at NHAI HQ -reg: Background: The need of good DPR for Highway Projects is of paramount importance for safety, reliability and quality Highways This aspect has been examined & it is observed that ROs/PDs are generally unable to devote adequate time for review and qualitative inputs on DPR submissions/ deliverables: Also, non-uniformity in review mechanism of DPR Preparation is also one of the challenge: Therefore, in order to bring uniformity in review mechanism, it has been decided to set-up DPR Cell at NHAI HQ for end-to-end monitoring and review of DPR Projects ensuring quality DPRs are prepared and adequately challenged before projects move to implementation stage. 2.1 Responsibilities of DPR Cell: Advise ROs/PDs in overall planning and methodology for desired outcome of DPR preparation: Advise and support in finalization of Alignment from techno economic considerations. Render necessary advise in finalization of design of various parameters of all highway components (Highway & Structures) as per extant IRC specifications and standards. Contribute to value engineering/innovative practices for enhancing quality output in DPR relevant to the projects. Conduct necessary site visits to overlook the progress of DPR projects. Review adequacy of  testing on  ground as per  frequency and adopted testing methodology: Thoroughly review draft DPR Report, final DPR Report, documents and drawings. Review of cost estimate based on design features, quantification thereof and rate analysis. Review of cost of preconstruction activities. Review of bid documents and technical schedules. Assist in incorporating the project in a model with Highway information model software. (HIMS) Define and enforce standardization of guidelines for DPR Management: Develop Institutional mechanism and monitoring system to ensure uniform implementation of reviewing process across DPR project lifecycle and provide a robust support system: Upkeeping all DPR data in a Central Repository in digital format: Stringent action against DPR Consultant in consultation with Technical Division. other attribute/ technology to deliver quality DPR.
